medical_history.chief_complaint: Low mid/left abdominal pain for 48 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started yesterday morning upon waking, described as increasing discomfort in the mid to left suprapubic area. Associated symptoms include nausea, dry heave, anorexia, bloating, and chills. The patient denies diarrhea, constipation, fever, vomiting, and blood per rectum. Last bowel movement was today, and she has passed gas.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of lymphoma; mother has a history of heart problems.
